casebody.data:
First Department,

June, 1962

(June 5, 1962) The People of the State of New York v. Rex Lampkins.

Motion for leave to appeal as a poor person and motion for an enlargement of time granted to the extent and on the terms and conditions contained in the order of this court filed herein. Concur — Botein, P. J., Stevens, Eager, Steuer and Bergan, JJ.
